about_the_game:
Dive into the mysterious Questwood, a cursed forest filled with ancient secrets and hidden treasures. Experience the magic of cooperation as you team up with friends or explore the randomly generated levels solo. Fight with many different enemies and solve puzzles troughout the forest! To conquer the level, you need to find the exit to move on to the next part of Questwood. Can you get to the middle of the forest and defeat the cursed tree that slowly turns all the lands into a forest?

Archer, bomber, spartan and wizard!

Choose out of 4 different classes, each with their own unique items and abilities! Shoot arrows and use your grappling hook as the archer. Blow everything up as the bomber! Go for melee combat with the spartan. Or cast different spells as the wizard. Each class has it's own loot and every weapon you find gives you a special weapon ability.

A new level each time you play

With procedurally generated levels, each offering its own set of challenges and rewards, Questwood offers an adventure experience that keeps you coming back for more. Whether you're an seasoned adventurer or new to the genre, this game has it all—adventures filled with discovery, puzzles, and combat.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Processor: Apple M1 Pro
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: At least a 1 MBps internet connection is required for online multiplayer.
